author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <arjunsuri> Hello all, This is Arjun. I am quite new to the blockchain technology and I wanted to contribute in Ethereum. Could anyone tell me where should a beginner start contributing?

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <protolambda> @arjunsuri Hello, nice to hear you want to contribute. Ethereum has many different technical challenges to contribute to however. It all depends on your background/interests. https://www.reddit.com/r/ethdev/ may be a better place to learn about what's there to work on.
